posts.post_title: FS T206 Mathewson Dark Cap SGC 1 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Paper loss on the back.

SOLD.  I'm new on the forum so we will have to figure out a payment that works for both of us.

Thanks
Steve and I worked out a deal for this card. He’s new to the Boards but easy to work with. It was a very smooth transaction. Thank you Steve, and welcome.
